title: Apple’s team is at Tata Electronics’ fire-hit unit to ‘counsel and guide’
description: Apple's SR team comprises three company officials. It is expected to review the situation and support its sole Indian vendor which produces enclosures for the iPhones, sources said. A government-related probe is also underway, they added.
content: Apple’s supplier responsibility (SR) team has been at the Tata Electronics facility in Hosur since Sunday to “counsel and advise” the Indian contract manufacturer that suffered a massive fire in one of its units on Saturday, multiple people aware of the developments told ET.This is a routine occurrence whenever incidents of this nature occur, they added.The SR team, which consists of three Apple officials, is expected to review the situation and support its sole Indian vendor which produces enclosures for the iPhones, one of the persons cited above said.
